about.description: Over 6,000 of Ontarioâ€™s finest taking over downtown Toronto for 3 days of fierce competition and professional development.
about.subdescription: The second competition of the year invites qualifying students to continue to compete in their chosen category from the Regional Competition. Students who did not qualify at the Regionals may choose to participate in a written event category or the Leadership Development Academy (LDA). This two-day competition is loaded with award ceremonies, sponsor showcases with a scavenger hunt and draws, and evening entertainment. Achievement at the Provincials will determine who will compete in their categories at the International Career Development Conference.
about.address: 123 Queen Street West, Toronto, ON M5H 2M9
about.costsub: The cost of the competition varies based on registration package chosen.
